name: Audit Name
gustmessage: Thank you for choosing our hospital for your healthcare needs. We constantly work to improve and meet your expectations. To serve our patients better, kindly spare a few minutes to fill out this feedback form. Your opinion is of immense value to us.
detractor: Please describe reason for low rating
happythankyoumessage: Thank you for taking your time out to provide your valuable inputs.
unhappythankyoumessage: Thank you for taking your time out to provide your valuable inputs.
correct_medicine: Has the correct drug been selected for the patient's condition?
correct_quantity: Has the appropriate dose been prescribed?
medicine_expiry: Has the correct unit of measurement for the drug dose been used?
apron: Has the correct frequency of administration been specified?
lead_apron: Has the correct route of administration been mentioned?
use_xray_barrior: Has the correct drug concentration been prescribed?
administration_rate: Has the correct rate of administration been indicated?
therapeutic_duplication: Has the prescription been checked for therapeutic duplication?
handwriting_legible: Is the handwriting legible and easily understandable?
medical_abbreviations: Have only approved medical abbreviations been used in the prescription?
capital_letters: Have drug names been written using capital letters to avoid confusion?
generic_name: Has the drug been prescribed using its generic name?
drug_interaction: Has the drug dose been modified considering potential drug-drug interactions?
food_drug: Has the timing, dose, or choice of drug been adjusted considering food-drug interactions?
drug_dispensed: Has the correct drug been dispensed as per the prescription?
dose_dispensed: Has the correct dose of the medication been dispensed?
formulation_dispensed: Has the correct formulation (e.g., tablet, syrup, injection) been dispensed?
expired_drungs: Has the pharmacist ensured that expired or near-expiry drugs are not dispensed?
accurate_patient: Has the medication been properly labeled with accurate patient and drug information?
medication_dispese: Was the medication dispensed within the defined acceptable timeframe?
generic_substitution: Has any generic or therapeutic substitution been done only after consulting the prescribing doctor?
correct_patient: Has the medication been administered to the correct patient?
dose_omitted: Has any prescribed dose been unintentionally omitted?
medication_dose: Has the correct dose of the medication been administered?
drug_administered: Has the correct drug been administered as per the prescription?
correct_dosage: Has the correct dosage form (e.g., tablet, injection, syrup) been used?
correct_route: Has the correct route of administration (e.g., oral, IV, IM) been followed?
correct_rate: Has the medication been administered at the correct rate?
correct_duration: Has the medication been administered for the correct duration?
correct_time: Has the medication been given at the correct time as prescribed?
drug_administration: Has the drug administration been properly documented?
nursing_staff: Has the documentation by nursing staff been complete and accurate?
documentation_drug: Has there been any documentation without actual drug administration?
